DescriptionTemplates: A {Adjective} maintenance tunnel forces you to move carefully. {Detail}. This passage was never meant for comfort.
This {Adjective} service crawlway is barely passable. {Detail}. Workers must have hated using this route.
You squeeze through a {Adjective} access shaft. {Detail}. The walls press in on both sides.
Details: Tool marks scar the metal walls
Emergency lighting strips provide dim illumination
The ceiling is so low you must duck your head
Graffiti in Old Aetheric marks rest stops
An abandoned toolbox lies wedged in a corner
